target_markets.market_description: Businesses needing design services and marketing for boring/traditional industries
target_markets.market_size_indicators: mentions of biggest tech companies in the world as clients

problems_validated.problem: High-cost design services with limited requests
problems_validated.severity: significant enough to build subscription model around
problems_validated.current_solutions: traditional design agencies with project-based pricing
problems_validated.market_gap: no unlimited design subscription with international talent and AI enhancement

products_tools.name: Dispatch
products_tools.use_case: unlimited design requests for fixed monthly fee
products_tools.pricing: fixed monthly fee (described as cheap for high-end design)
products_tools.metrics: four new subscriptions added last week

products_tools.name: Boring Marketing
products_tools.use_case: SEO and marketing for boring/traditional businesses

business_strategies.strategy: Use international (non-US) designers and AI-enhanced productivity to reduce costs
business_strategies.implementation: hire international talent, implement AI tools, create reusable UI kits
business_strategies.expected_results: ability to offer high-end design at lower prices

business_strategies.strategy: Product studio model - building multiple companies under one holding company
business_strategies.implementation: create systematic approach with checklists and formulas for new company creation
business_strategies.expected_results: diversified portfolio with multiple revenue streams
business_strategies.case_study: Late Checkout holding company with multiple subsidiaries

business_strategies.strategy: Leverage existing systems and team efficiency as unfair advantage
business_strategies.implementation: build reusable systems, UI kits, and team processes over 3 years
business_strategies.expected_results: speed and efficiency advantages in service delivery
business_strategies.case_study: 3 years of agency experience enabling faster dispatch service

problems_solutions.problem: Knowing when to cut or invest more in projects
problems_solutions.solution: Use product-market fit signals and systematic evaluation
steps: assess if project feels like a slog

startup_ideas.idea: Design subscription service using international talent and AI
startup_ideas.business_model: fixed monthly subscription for unlimited design requests
startup_ideas.validation: four new subscriptions in one week

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Continuing projects that feel like a slog and don't fit the family
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: wasted resources, higher tensions, distraction from successful projects
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: implement monthly business reviews and honest team conversations
mistakes_to_avoid.example: unnamed projects that were sunset despite some success indicators

growth_tactics.tactic: Product Hunt launches for new services

steps: use AI to enhance designer productivity
